altTitles.ja: 怪異と乙女と神隠し

description.en: Mysterious incidents in a city, one after the other. A demonic being is challenged to resolve them. Sumireko, seemingly a plain store clerk, aspires to be a novelist and rocks an alluring body with some ardent admirers. Adashino, an admirer who looks like a boy, is a bookstore clerk. He's steeped in mystery however, at first, until the path of challenges is revealed that he and his sister must face in the city in order to win their ticket back home, outside this world. A story of modern mysteries and romantic aspirations begins.
description.ru: Ряд загадочных инцидентов начинают происходить в городе. И всё бы ничего если этот город не был домом для Сумиреко, красивой девушки с писательским стремлением. Какие же происшествия будут ждать Сумиреко и её коллегу по работе, Адашино, полного загадок парня, работающего в книжном?
description.pt-br: Uma série de acidentes misteriosos acontecem um atrás do outro na cidade. Um ser demoníaco está desafiando a todos que os resolvam. Sumireko, uma aparentemente caixa comum de loja, deseja ser uma escritora e possui um corpo voluptuoso com muitos admiradores ardentes. Adashino, um admirador que parece com um jovem garoto é o caixa de uma livraria. Ele está mergulhado em mistérios, e de repente, o caminho pra ele e sua irmã voltarem para casa (em outro mundo) aparece. Uma história moderna de romance e aspirações começa!

altTitles.ja: エレキシード

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

description.es:
Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

altTitles.es-la: La Vida Después de la Muerte

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

altTitles.ja: ユーリ!!! on ICE  - Smile (Doujinshi)

description.en: Pairing: Yuuri x Viktor

Do good or go to hell. The conditions of his new curse seem simple enough for once-hopeful hoodlum Jeonji Kim. Or so it seems when his perky guardian angel shows up on his doorstep one day and heals his limp. But will simply going through the motions of helping people be enough to appease a petty god with a grudge?
description.pl: Bądź dobry lub idź do piekła. Warunki jego nowej klątwy wydają się wystarczająco proste dla niegdyś pełnego nadziei chuligana Jeonjiego Kima. A przynajmniej tak się wydaje, gdy pewnego dnia jego żwawy anioł stróż pojawia się na jego progu i leczy jego utykanie. Czy zwykłe pomaganie ludziom wystarczy, aby udobruchać małostkowego boga miejącego urazę?
description.ru:
Ты был легендой — стал никем,
Как старый лев среди шакалов.
Мечты все обратились в тлен,
Погребены среди завалов.

Увидев слабого, толкни,
Пусть и его жизнь станет адом.
Вот только даже в наши дни
Легенды оживают рядом. © RSC
description.pt-br: Faça o bem ou vá para o inferno. As condições de sua nova maldição parecem simples o suficiente para o outrora esperançoso bandido Kim Jeonji. Ou assim parece quando seu animado anjo da guarda aparece em sua porta um dia e o cura. Mas será que simplesmente fazer o que é necessário para ajudar as pessoas será o suficiente para apaziguar um deus mesquinho com rancor?

description.en: A series between the expressionless drugstore clerk, Sa-chan, and her boisterous childhood friend who's head over heels over Sa-chan but hesitant in confessing his love for her. Join them in their romcom-packed everyday life working at a drugstore.
description.fr: > Une série réunissant une employée de pharmacie sans expression, Sa-chan, et son ami d'enfance turbulent qui est fou amoureux d'elle mais qui hésite à lui avouer son amour. Accompagnez-les dans leur quotidien plein de comédie amoureuse en travaillant dans une pharmacie.
description.id: Seri antara petugas toko obat tanpa ekspresi, Sa-chan, dan teman masa kecilnya yang riuh yang jungkir balik terhadap Sa-chan tetapi ragu-ragu dalam mengakui cintanya padanya. Bergabunglah dengan mereka dalam kehidupan sehari-hari mereka yang penuh romansa bekerja di toko obat.
description.ja: ドラッグストアで働くさっちゃんとその幼なじみが両思いなんだけど、お互い気づかなくて毎日やきもきする話です。
description.pt-br: Uma série entre a inexpressiva balconista da drogaria, Sa-chan, e seu turbulento amigo de infância que está de ponta-cabeça por Sa-chan, mas hesita em confessar seu amor por ela. Junte-se a eles em sua vida cotidiana repleta de comédia romântica trabalhando em uma farmácia.

description.en:
Seongwu is a former special forces soldier who has returned to college after completing his national service. His ordinary life as a student is shattered during class one day when he and his fellow students are faced with a mysterious prompt asking them to “select a role.”

Seongwu chooses the necromancer, a rare ability that grants him the power to control the undead.

With the campus and outside world seemingly on the brink of collapse, Seongwu must use his newfound powers to battle fearsome monsters and help save his fellow students. But will they make it out alive?

description.fr:
"Quel est le métier le plus utile pour survivre dans un monde en ruine ?". Cette question apparaît devant Seong-woo alors qu'il somnole en cours. Lui et les autres étudiants ont 15 secondes pour choisir une carte parmi celles qui sont apparues devant eux. Celle choisie déterminera leurs pouvoirs qui leur permettront de survivre dans un monde chaotique, qui ressemble fortement à un jeu vidéo. Pour sa part, Seong-woo sera un nécromancien !

description.ko:
곧 세상이 멸망한다.
전설 속에나 나올 법한 몬스터들이 각지에 출현한다.
그리고 사람들을 잡아먹고, 길거리를 점령하며, 빌딩과 지하철에 던전을 만들기 시작한다.

멸망한 세계에서 살아남기 위해 단 한 가지 직업을 고를 수 있다.
당신은 무슨 직업을 고르겠는가?
"네크로맨서"

나에게는 멸망이 무대이고, 죽음이 자산이 된다.

---

description.ru:
Мир на грани разрушения. Существа, упоминания о которых встречались лишь в мифах и легендах, теперь заполоняют города, обживаются под людскими жилищами и в метро, пожирая всё живое.
А что до человечества… Ему будет предложено занять новую роль в нынешнем мире выживания.
Сонву выбрал класс «некромант», и теперь трупы, что обагряют Землю, ему только на руку.

---

description.zh:
魔物侵袭，世界灭亡在即！
退役特种兵的降维打击！
某一天，只存在于传说中的魔物们突然出现，肆意地破坏街道、撕咬人类，并且在高楼和地铁建立起了自己的巢穴…如果在灭亡的世界，能够选择一个职业，你会选择哪种职业呢？对于身为“死灵法师”的刘成宇来说，灭亡即是舞台，丧生即为资产。

description.en: Cocochino book about Chino-chan vs AI Chino-chan!

I am a wanderer martial artist. I don’t shy away from blood, but I’m ready to retire. Should I take one last job? or not?

For many long years, he has roamed as a wandering martial artist's, living as a hired blade to make ends meet.

But now, he finds himself utterly penniless, living in poverty with nothing to his name.

As a master of martial arts at the peak level, he makes a decision, to take on one final, high-stakes mission, earn a fortune, and put an end to his life as a wanderer.

The story follows his journey as he takes on this last assignment and the unexpected twists that unfold along the way.

description.en:
A young man who gets into a plane crash while returning from a business trip overseas is reincarnated into another world after being asked by the goddess to defeat the evil god.   
  
However, he was reincarnated as a stupid prince who is known among the aristocrats as the "Pig Prince (Orc Prince)" because of his fat and ugly appearance. If you can't even do one sit-up, how are you going to defeat the evil god? This is the story of the Pig Prince's struggle to lose weight!  
  


---
description.id:
Seorang pemuda yang mengalami kecelakaan pesawat saat pulang dari perjalan binis di luar negeri direinkarnasi ke dunia lain setelah diminta oleh dewi untuk mengalahkan dewa jahat.   
  
Akan tetapi, ia tereinkarnasi sebagai seorang pangeran bodoh. yang terkenal di kalangan ningrat dengan julukan "Pangeran Orc/Pangeran Babi" karena penampilannya yang gendut dan jelek. Sit-up saja tidak bisa, apalagi mengalahkan dewa jahat? Inilah kisah perjuangan si Pangeran Babi dalam menurunkan berat badan!

altTitles.ja: 白黒セカイ

description.en: A series of stories between a girl with black hair and a girl with white hair

altTitles.ja: ねずみの初恋

description.en:
Nezumi is a girl who was raised as a hitman by the yakuza and grew up not knowing human love. An ordinary young man, Ao, knows nothing. They fall in love and start to live together, but the evil hand is close at hand... This is a story of first love, so cruel and so sad.

Read the prequel oneshot featuring Messiah-chan's backstory [here](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).
description.fr: Nezumi est une fille qui a été élevée comme tueuse à gages par les yakuzas et qui a grandi sans connaître l'amour humain. Un jeune homme ordinaire, Ao, n'en sait rien. Ils tombent amoureux et commencent à vivre ensemble, mais la main du mal est proche.... C'est l'histoire d'un premier amour, si cruel et si triste.
description.ja: ヤクザに殺し屋として育てられ、人の愛を知らずに育った少女、ねずみ。何も知らない普通の青年、碧(あお)。二人は恋に落ち、共に暮らし始めるが、魔の手はすぐそこまで迫っていた‥‥。
description.pt-br:
Nezumi, uma garota criada como uma assassina pela yakuza, cresceu sem conhecer o amor humano. Ao, um jovem comum, não sabe nada sobre o passado sombrio dela. Mesmo assim, eles se apaixonam e começam a viver juntos, mas o perigo está à espreita... Esta é uma história de um primeiro amor, tão cruel e triste.

Leia o oneshot prequel, que conta a história de origem da Messiah-chan, [aqui](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).

title.en: A Middle-Aged Man Who Returns From Another World Goes Back to When He Was 17 and Becomes Unbeatable

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りのアラフォーリーマン、17歳の頃に戻って無双する

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Kaeri no Arafour Riiman, 17-sai no Koro ni Modotte Musou suru

description.en:
A black company employee in his 40s, Namba Kazu, died of overwork and was reincarnated to another world. After saving the world, he returns to find himself regressed to his 17-year-old self. 

Kazu realizes that he can use the abilities he acquired from another world and is excited to restart his life over again. However, through the help of his childhood friend, Yui, he learns of the existence of human-eating abomination called Variant in the world he was born in. 

Kazu knows from his past memories that Yui will die in the near future. In order to save Yui, who is on a mission to fight against variants, Kazu decided to throw himself into battle in this world as well.
description.ja:
過労死で異世界に転生したアラフォーリーマンの難波カズ。17歳で異世界を救ったカズは、女神に「元の世界に戻してくれ」と願う。てっきり元のアラフォーリーマンに戻ると思っていたら、17歳の高校生に戻っていた。

それならばと気楽に90年代を満喫しようとしていたが、幼馴染みの由依をきっかけに『人間を喰う異形ヴァリアント』の存在を知り、カズは異世界チートを武器にこの世界でも戦いに身を投じていく…!
description.es-la: Kazu Nanba reencarnó después de la muerte por exceso de trabajo y salvó otro mundo. A la edad de 17 años en el otro mundo después de morir derrotando al rey demonio elije "regresara a su mundo original". Pensó que regresaría a su trabajo normal, pero regreso como un estudiante de secundaria de 17 años. Sin embargo ahora se entera que hay "extrañas criaturas" que matan humanos y donde Kazu recordara un recuerdo pasado donde su amiga de la infancia Yui morirá en un futuro cercano. Esta vez, para salvar a Yui, Kazu usará el poder de otro mundo para lanzarse también a la batalla en este mundo.

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…
description.pt-br: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada “Shy”...

The Gal Who Was Meant to Confess to Me as a Punishment Game Has Apparently Fallen in Love with Me

altTitles.vi: Nhỏ Gyaru lẽ ra tỏ tình với người u ám như tôi chỉ vì trò chơi trừng phạt, nhưng dù có nhìn kiểu gì thì cổ cũng yêu tôi mà!

description.en:
When the gorgeous Nanami Barato confesses to Yoshin Misumai, it seems too good to be true! Only, it is—and Yoshin knows it. How’s an introverted guy like him supposed to keep his cool when he knows this is all just a dare? Even more puzzling, despite her gaudy appearance, this supposed gyaru isn’t actually all that good with guys! Perhaps this is the perfect chance for this shy guy to pluck up his own courage and say yes to the guy-shy girl. So begins their new cushy life of morning meet-ups and handmade lunches. The thing is, judging by the way she’s acting, Nanami has fallen head over heels for him! From dares and dating to downright disasters, can these two first-timers figure out their feelings and maybe even fall in love—for real, this time?!

---
**Links:**
- Official Video Manga - [YouTube](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0zfSjyskgIUZdlu7xyxLAv956kN32dP6) (Chapters 1-3, With voice acting)
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/an-introvert-s-hookup-hiccups)
description.ja:
**陰キャ×清楚ギャル、罰ゲームから始まるピュアラブコメ!!**

クラス内カーストトップの清楚ギャル・茨戸七海に罰ゲームで告白されて付き合うことになった陰キャ男子・簾舞陽信。 しかし罰ゲームのはずが、七海は陽信にガチ惚れしているようで…？
description.pl: Kiedy piękna Nanami Barato wyznaje miłość Yoshinowi Misumai, wydaje się to zbyt piękne, by mogło być prawdziwe! Tylko, że tak jest - i Yoshin o tym wie. Jak taki introwertyczny facet jak on ma zachować zimną krew, skoro wie, że to tylko wyzwanie? Jeszcze bardziej zastanawiające jest to, że pomimo jej krzykliwego wyglądu, ta rzekoma gyaru nie jest tak dobra w kontaktach z facetami! Być może jest to idealna okazja dla tego nieśmiałego faceta, aby zebrać się na odwagę i powiedzieć "tak" tej nieśmiałej dziewczynie. Tak zaczyna się ich nowe, wygodne życie porannych spotkań i ręcznie robionych lunchów. Rzecz w tym, że sądząc po jej zachowaniu, Nanami zakochała się w nim po uszy! Czy ta dwójka może odkryć swoje uczucia, a może nawet zakochać się w sobie - tym razem naprawdę?!
description.pt-br: Barato Nanami, uma versão atenuada da garota no topo da hierarquia da escola, perdeu um jogo de cartas e agora tem que confessar a um cara de sua classe como punição. Misumai Youshin, que é um solitário sem amigos, foi o cara escolhido, mas ele sabe da punição! Deveria ter sido uma punição do jogo, mas será que Nanami vai desenvolver sentimentos por Youshin…?

title.en: Aorikei Game Haishinsha (20-sai), Haishin no Kiri Wasure ni Yori Ii Hito Bare Suru.

altTitles.en: A Toxic 20-Year-Old Game Streamer Accidentally Reveals His Nice Personality Because He Forgot to End the Stream

altTitles.ja-ro: Aori-kei Game Haishinsha (Hatachi), Haishin no Kiri Wasure ni Yori Ii Hito Baresuru.

altTitles.ja: 煽り系ゲーム配信者（20歳）、配信の切り忘れによりいい人バレする。

altTitles.pt-br: Um Streamer Tóxico de 20 Anos Acidentalmente Revela Sua Personalidade Gentil Porque Esqueceu de Encerrar a Live

description.en: Nakayama Haruto is a game commentator who streams provocative content under the name "Oni-chan." He attracts attention for his radical streams , but his true identity is that of a good older brother who streams to raise money for his younger sister's tuition and living expenses. However, he accidentally forgets to turn off the streams, and his true personality is revealed to the public. Just when it seems like he's going to cause a major uproar, the contrast with his usual self turns out to be a big hit with viewers...!?
description.ja: 煽り配信を行うゲーム実況者『鬼ちゃん』として活動する中山春斗。過激な配信で注目を集める彼だったが、裏の顔は妹の学費や生活費のために活動する良き兄だった。だが、うっかり配信を切り忘れたことで素の人柄が世間にバレてしまう。大炎上かと思いきや、普段とのギャップが視聴者に大ウケしてしまい……!?
description.pt-br: Nakayama Haruto é um gamer que faz lives provocativas com o nome de "Oni-chan." Ele atrai atenção pelas suas streams radicais, mas sua verdadeira identidade é a de um bom irmão mais velho, que faz lives para juntar dinheiro e pagar os estudos e as despesas de sua irmã mais nova. No entanto, ele esquece de desligar a live, e sua verdadeira personalidade é revelada ao público. Quando parecia que ele iria causar um grande escândalo, o contraste com sua personalidade habitual acaba conquistando os espectadores...!?

altTitles.ja: おやすみ ふみさん

description.en: Rinta, who moved to the city from the countryside and enrolled in a university in the heart of the city, meets “Fumi-san,” rumored to be the most beautiful girl on campus, in the literature club he joined. After attending a drinking party together, he ends up walking her home. He safely escorts her to her house and is about to head back when suddenly… Fumi-san transforms and forcefully invites him to her bed—!? “I wonder how long you can keep being a good person, Rinta-kun…?” Fumi-san pushes Rinta to his limits, testing his self-control until it shatters. Thus begins a forbidden university life filled with temptation.

Ryouko is lost in questions about the cause of his death. But from that night on, terrible things start happening everywhere around her!

altTitles.en: Falling In Love Gives Me Superpowers

description.en: Art student Zhong Shenxiu encountered a problem during a sketching class. She couldn't "truly see" Xu Ke, a top student and the subject of the sketch. If she can't truly see the subject then she can't draw. Zhong Shenxiu put down her paintbrush. If she became a better student, she would be able to get closer to her, right? If she could get closer to her, then she could truly see her, right? Until the distance between them is no more--Face to face. Phew! Now I can finally see her! But! This is... Too close! Help! What Should I do?!!!

altTitles.ja: 不死無敵

description.en:
From a thieving child to one who would shake the world. Rising to the title of Immortal Master, one of the Godly Twelve Stars, but ultimately betrayed. Now, he has been given a chance to change that, and create a better future- for both him, and the world. Based on the popular novel of the same name.

description.ja:
孤児として育ち、三十年以上もの辛く厳しい歳月を耐え抜いた後、「不死尊」という名が与えられた。 そして最後は濡れ衣を着せられ、血生臭い生涯を終えた。 しかし、気がつくと赤ん坊の姿に！？ 「不死尊」の記憶を持ったまま名家の息子「荘雲」として生まれ変わったのだ！

시중사교주의 음모를 막기위한 그의 활약을 기대하시라!

От вороватого ребенка до того, кто потрясет мир. Он взошёл к званию Бессмертного мастера, одной из двенадцати Божественных звезд, но в конце концов его предали. Теперь у него появился шанс изменить это и создать лучшее будущее — и для себя, и для целого мира.

altTitles.ja: シャンピニオンの魔女

description.en: Luna, a black witch who lives quietly in a poisonous mushroom house, deep in the Black Forest. She lives in the city making high-efficiency medicine, but it is rumored that one will die if touched by her, and thus she is avoided… The life of a witch who doesn't know the warmth of people is carefully and momentarily drawn.

altTitles.pt-br: Convento de Monstros: Ordem Signiana de Missa

altTitles.la: Conventus Monstrorum: Ordo Signae de Missa

altTitles.en: Monsters' Convent: Signian Order of Missa

description.en: Gags of a Catholic Convent on a Fantasy World.
description.pt-br: Tirinhas sobre um Convento Católico num mundo de fantasia.

title.en: Chika Idol wo Kage de Sasaeru Ore

altTitles.ja: 地下アイドルを影で支える俺

altTitles.en: Supporting an Underground Idol from the Shadows

description.en:
Kageyama, an unremarkable boy, secretly receives a message from gal classmate Natsukawa , saying, “Meet me at the usual karaoke place after school.” 

He goes to karaoke with her alone. There, Kageyama reveals something he had been asked by Natsukawa to show her.
description.pl: Kageyama, niewyróżniający się chłopak, otrzymuje potajemnie wiadomość od koleżanki z klasy, Natsukawy, o treści "Spotkajmy się po szkole w miejscu z Karaoke". Idzie tam z nią sam na sam. Tam, Kageyama pokazuje coś o co został poproszony przez Natsukawe.
description.pt-br:
Kageyama, um garoto normal, recebe secretamente uma mensagem da colega de classe Natsukawa, dizendo: “Encontre-me no karaokê de sempre depois da escola”.

Ele vai ao karaokê sozinho com ela. Lá, Kageyama revela algo que Natsukawa pediu para mostrar a ela.

title.en: Sono Akuyaku Kizoku, Mama Heroine ga Suki Sugiru ~Shinshi na Doryoku de Saikyou to Nari Fuguu na Oshi Chara Tasukemakuru~

altTitles.ja: その悪役貴族、ママヒロインが好きすぎる ～真摯な努力で最強となり不遇な推しキャラ助けまくる～

altTitles.en: The Villainous Noble Loves Mom Heroines Too Much ~Becoming The Strongest With Sincere Effort To Save Misfortunate Fave Chars~
That Villainous Aristocrat Is Actually Crazy About Mom Heroines ~With His Earnest Hard Work, He Becomes the Strongest and Saves All of His Favorite Characters~

description.en: The mom characters that appear in the game are all unfortunate sub-heroines who always get bad ending routes. “Why… Why does such a cute mom have to die?!“ Even though the protagonist tried very hard to request a route where they get saved, all of his efforts were in vain, making him spend his days in frustration. Then, he suddenly gets reincarnated into the world of MamaFan on a certain day. …However, he gets reincarnated as a villainous aristocrat who’s got nothing but the worst routes. This guy, who’s crazy about mom characters — his fulfilling days of saving his beloved mom characters and his journey to create his harem full of plump women are about to begin!___**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/71300)

altTitles.ja: ヤッターラ

description.en: A gluttonous monster, Yattara, is drawn to a city of splendor and opulence. Its only pleasure in life: eating. It finds its favorite meal, children, and is ready to dig in as usual but then…a flash of inspiration strikes?

altTitles.ja: つらねこ

description.en:
Chibi-chan, a middle school girl, can go no further than 2km from the sacred tree that servers as her town's symbol. That is her "disability".
Then one day, a mysterious figure arrives in town to help the girl's wish to leave, her name is Rokushaku-sensei.
Guided by Rokushaku, Chibi attempts to bypass her "disability" by going to "Nedoko", backroads that can transport her to another location.
However, those places are part of a mysterious world, filled with mysterious creatures.
In her desire to see the world, Chibi-chan will have to triumph over these "Nedoko".
description.ja:
中学生の女の子・チビちゃんは、町のシンボルである御神木から2kmより先に出ることのできない特殊な「障害」を持っていました。
そんなある日、町から出ることを望んだ彼女の願いを手助けする存在・六尺先生が現れます。
先生に導かれて「障害」を無視してよそに土地に行くことのできる抜け道「ネドコ」に赴くことに。
しかしそこは不思議な生き物のあふれる、不思議な世界。
チビちゃんはよその土地に行く自由を手に入れるべく、「ネドコ」に挑戦します。

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

title.en: Unaware His Majesty Is a Girl

altTitles.vi: Hoàng đế bệ hạ là nữ lang

altTitles.my: ဘုရင်ကြီးကမိန်းကလေးမှန်းမသိခဲ့ဘူး

altTitles.vi: Không Ngờ Bệ Hạ Là Nữ

description.en:
The new emperor, Qi Nian, acceded to the throne many years ago. He kept refusing the requests by his officials to choose a consort, brushing them off by saying "the affairs of state are important, and I am busy with my work". But Qi Nian finally relented as rumors that "the emperor is impotent" spread ever more widely.

Yu Dingdang was a particularly dim-witted girl, but born to a prestigious family. This led many to say: "Madame Yu exchanged her brain for her looks". Who could have expected that Yu would be selected by the emperor to be his empress consort?

A happy and dramatic girl-girl romantic comedy set in the imperial palace. Yu couldn't have expected that this lofty emperor up on high was actually a girl?!
description.zh: 新帝祁念登基多年，却终日以“国事要紧，朕沉迷工作”，拒绝了朝臣们的选妃请求。但“皇帝不行”的流言愈演愈烈，祁念不胜其烦，终是松口。玉玎珰出身名门，却生了个榆木脑袋，众人纷纷道：“玉家小姐是拿脑子换的脸”却不想，一朝入选，她竟成了国母。玉玎珰表面：啊？什么？是我吗？内心却汹涌澎湃。只因玉玎珰从小便立誓，一！定！要！成！为！祁！念！的！女！人！迷妹追星成功，在皇宫里上演了一系列“她逃她追，她插翅难飞”的啼笑皆非的欢喜故事却不想，这高高在上的至尊帝王，竟是女儿身？！
description.zh-hk: 新帝祁念登基多年，卻終日以“國事要緊，朕沉迷工作”，拒絕了朝臣們的選妃請求。 但「皇帝不行」的流言愈演愈烈，祁念不勝其煩，終是鬆口。 玉玎璫出身名門，卻生了個榆木腦袋，眾人紛紛道：「玉家小姐是拿腦子換的臉」卻不想，一朝入選，她竟成了國母。 玉玎璫表面：啊？ 什麼？ 是我嗎？ 內心卻洶湧澎湃。 只因玉玎璫從小便立誓，一！ 定！ 要！ 成！ 為！ 祁！ 念！ 的！ 女！ 人！ 迷妹追星成功，在皇宮裡上演了一系列「她逃她追，她插翅難飛」的啼笑皆非的歡喜故事卻不想，這高高在上的至尊帝王，竟是女兒身？ ！

altTitles.ja: せんゆう。
戦勇。

description.en:
Once upon a time, a Demon King named Rchimedes caused havoc and destruction in the Human World. He was sealed away by the great hero Creasion, and peace returned to the world.  
  
1000 years later, Rchimedes has returned, a hole has opened up in the Human World, and countless monsters have sprung up. To prevent any further destruction, the King calls upon all 75 (probable) descendants of Creasion.  
  
This story focuses on the adventures of descendant number 45, Alba, and the royal soldier appointed to assist him, Ross.  
  
[Senyuu Season 1](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu)    
[Senyuu Season 2](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu2)

title.en: Kono Ai wo Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.ja: この愛を終わらせてくれないか
Kono Ai o Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.zh: 能让这份爱画上休止符吗

altTitles.vi: Chấm dứt tình yêu này đi được không?

description.en: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.
description.vi:
Hachikawa Yuzu, một nữ sinh cấp 3 với cuộc đời học đường ảm đạm có một bí mật. Rằng thực chất cô ấy là một người hâm mộ cuồng nhiệt của Hayami Madoka, bạn cùng lớp và cũng là một nữ diễn viên nổi tiếng.
Yuzu, ngưỡng mộ và tôn sùng Madoka như một nữ thần, cảm thấy hạnh phúc khi chỉ đơn giản được học cùng lớp và nhìn ngắm Madoka mỗi ngày.
Lẽ ra chỉ như thế đã đủ, nhưng cho tới một ngày...
Một câu chuyện tình yêu méo mó nhưng đồng thời cũng vô cùng thuần khiết.

altTitles.ja: 偏愛カフェ

description.en: Somewhere there is a strange café called "Statice" where all sorts of even stranger people meet, each with a very special and different fetish. The owner, Mr. Sennichi, welcomes these special customers every day, and tries to help them solve their fetish related problems.
description.ja: 人は誰しも秘密を抱え、思い煩う。たとえばそれが、他人には理解し難い性的嗜好なら尚――。“生理血嗜好、加虐性愛、妊婦性愛、人形性愛”これはカフェ「statice」に訪れた性的倒錯者（パラフィリアン）による、裸の告白。

title.en: Jichou shinai Moto Yuusha no Tsuyokute Tanoshii New Game

altTitles.ja: 自重しない元勇者の強くて楽しいニューゲーム

altTitles.en: The Former Legendary Hero will Enjoy His Second Life without Restraint

altTitles.zh: 不自重前勇者强大又轻松的NEW GAME

altTitles.zh-hk: 不自重前勇者強大又輕鬆的NEW GAME

description.en:
Orion is a former hero who has been reborn in a different world he once saved as a "hero". Taking advantage of his second round of heroic heroism, he takes on the world's strongest and wisest maid who was once in the same party with him, picks up a slave girl, and trains her with "heroic-style power leveling"! Even if you are attacked by a thief monster girl, you can easily convert her and get her a friend!

The former hero who never takes responsibility for his own actions, who has acquired a luxurious mansion, the most powerful equipment, beautiful women, fame, and everything else he needs to live his life the way he wants to, has started a new game of strength and fun!
description.ja: 「俺はもう自重しない!!」　かつて最強の勇者として、異世界を救った主人公オリオン。魔王を倒すという使命を果たし現実世界に戻ったものの、ブラック企業にすり潰される毎日。そんなある日、かつて自分が救った異世界へと再び転生を果たす。しかも勇者だった時の強さそのままで！そして…心に誓った。今度の人生では何ひとつ我慢しないことを!!

altTitles.ja: 君のいる町

description.en:
Kirishima Haruto lives in a small town in Hiroshima and is just about to enter high school when Eba Yuzuki, a mysterious girl from Tokyo suddenly decided to go to high school in the countryside and despite his objections, she moves in to his home.  
  
Haruto must now put up and take care of this clumsy freeloading city girl and at the same time, make sure his long time crush Kanzaki Nanami doesn't get the wrong idea!  
  
This story takes place a few years after the popular sports romance Suzuka and is based on the author, Seo Kouji’s hometown.

altTitles.en: Kantai Collection -Kan Colle- 4-koma Comic: Fubuki, Ganbarimasu!
艦隊これくしょん -艦これ- 4コマコミック 吹雪、がんばります!

description.en: Serialized in Famitsu Comic Clear. Based on the Kantai Collection browser game. Enjoy the heartwarming antics of the World War II-Era Japanese Imperial Navy in the form of cute girls training at the ship girl school.

altTitles.ja: 陰キャギャルでもイキがりたい！

altTitles.en: Even the Introverted Gals Wanna Get Out There!

description.en: Ichiko and Kuran are members of the subculture research club. They like various subcultures and they like cute stuff. Read along as these two asocial gyaru spend their days in their new kind of "youthful moratorium."

altTitles.en: Os Cavaleiros do Zodiaco - The Lost Canvas - A Saga de Hades
Saint Seiya - The Lost Canvas - Meiou Shinwa
Saint Seiya - The Lost Canvas - The Myth of Hades
聖闘士星矢 THE LOST CANVAS 冥王神話

description.en:
This manga tells the story of the previous Holy War, taking place in the 18th century, 250 years before the original series, in the Saint Seiya universe. The story centers on the relation between Tenma, the Pegasus Saint and his beloved friend, Alone, who would eventually become his greatest enemy, Hades.  
  
The story takes place in the same time period as Saint Seiya Next Dimension.
description.pt-br:
Este mangá conta a história da Guerra Santa anterior, que aconteceu no século XVIII, 250 anos antes da série original, no universo de Saint Seiya. A história é centrada na relação entre Tenma, o Cavaleiro de Pégaso e seu amado amigo, Alone, que eventualmente se tornaria seu maior inimigo, Hades. 

A história acontece no mesmo período de tempo de Saint Seiya Next Dimension.

title.en: Ninja Slayer: Kyoto, Hell on Earth

altTitles.ru: Ниндзя Слеер: Киото - ад на земле

altTitles.ja: ニンジャスレイヤー キョート・ヘル・オン・アース

altTitles.zh: 忍者杀手 杀伐都市京都

altTitles.en: Ninja Slayer: Kyoto, Hell on Earth

description.en: The man who annihilated the Soukaiya, the enemy of his wife and child, and buried Neo-Saitama in flames has appeared in Gaion City, Kyoto Republic! Ninja Slayer's new battle begins to eradicate his other enemy, the Zaibatsu! The second part of the hugely popular cyberpunk ninja novel, which has sold over 1.5 million copies in total, is now perfectly adapted into a comic!
description.zh:
击破了总会屋的忍者杀手，藤木户·健二，接下来开始朝着另一个仇人罪罚所在的京都进发
助他最终战胜老元·宽的奈落·忍者，在战斗的最后为了保护藤木户的身体而陷入沉眠，接下来的敌人京都罪罚的恐怖威势更是远超预想……
初来乍到的藤木户只在前往京都的路上都要经过连场大战，孤立无援的他究竟要如何才能坚持到最后，为妻儿的复仇画上句号？
在历史名都祇园，忍者杀手Vs忍者的激战在此拉开帷幕！

title.en: Ore no Isekai Shimai ga Jichou Shinai!

altTitles.ja: 俺の異世界姉妹が自重しない!

altTitles.en: My Otherworldly Sisters Won't Hold Back!

description.en:
*"Live free and be happy."*

These were the last words of Amemiya Yuya's sister, who was seriously ill. Despite her wishes, however, Yuya, who was suffering from the same disease as his sister, was supposed to end his short life without fulfilling his promise. But for unknown reasons, Yuya was suddenly reborn in another world. 

Confused by his new life, Yuya begins his life as the second son of a count. One day, Yuya thinks about the possibility that his younger sister has been reincarnated in this other world just like him. 

In this world, there is a sister, a young fiancée, a slave, a maid, etc. - but one of them is his own sister!

---

- ![Syosetsu](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4696dd)
description.ja: 「自由に生きて幸せになってね」――前世で妹と交わすも、病に侵され果たせなかった約束。伯爵家の次男リオンに転生したことで、ようやくその機会が巡ってきたかと思えば、妾の子という理由で、幽閉生活を強いられてしまう。このままでは約束を果たせない…と焦るリオンだったが、ある日転機が訪れ、義姉、美人奴隷、婚約者という3人の美少女たちと急接近。エスカレートしていく彼女たちのアピールにタジタジなリオンは、無事約束を果たせるのか！？

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

altTitles.ja: スロウスタート

description.en: Following an unfortunately timed case of the mumps, Hana Ichinose misses all of her high school entrance exams and ends up having to spend a gap year as a ronin. Moving to a new location and starting high school a year late, Hana becomes friends with her classmates, Eiko, Tama, and Kamuri, while keeping it a secret that she is a year older than them.

altTitles.ja: おさななじみの百合
ゴールデンマン

description.en:
The city of freedom, Neo York, is targeted by villains day and night, but it's also home to the strongest hero, Golden Man!!! But one night, during a rescue operation at a fire at an abandoned factory, Golden Man suddenly disappears. Left in his place, a single amnesiac young man with the Golden Man suit in his hands... Who on Earth is he?
___

description.ja: 自由の街ネオヨークを守るヒーロー・ゴールデンマンが、突然姿を消した。その失踪現場には、異常な強さを持つ記憶喪失の青年が倒れていた。ヒーロー不在の中、サポートチームは出現したヴィランに対抗するため、その青年をゴールデンマンとして送り出す。しかし、彼にはネオヨークの平和を揺るがす大きな秘密があった――！！

title.en: Hazure Hantei kara Hajimatta Cheat Majutsushi Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: ハズレ判定から始まったチート魔術士生活

altTitles.zh: 从废柴判定开始的魔术士人生

altTitles.en: Life as a Cheat Magician that began with a False Judgment

description.en:
One day, all the eighth grade students were transferred to another world.

The princess of the other world summoned them to make up for their lack of strength. The students are threatened and decide to follow the princess, and they are made to take a magical power test to determine their abilities. While everyone is sorted according to their results, Kokubun Kento's result is a flop.

Judged as useless, he is expelled. However, there is actually a tremendous ability lurking within Kento... 

The life-size eighth grader Kento, together with his fellow skeletons, aims to rescue his classmates!

---

description.ja:
ある日、中学２年生の生徒全員が異世界に転移させられた。

異世界の王女が、戦力不足を補うために彼らを召喚したのだ。脅されて王女に従うことにした生徒たちは、能力を調べる魔力判定を受けさせられる。みんなが結果に応じて振り分けられていくなか、国分健人の判定結果はハズレ。

使い物にならないと判断されて、追放されてしまった。だが、健人の内には実は物凄い能力が潜んでいて… 

等身大の中学２年生の健人が、仲間になったスケルトンとともに同級生たちの救出を目指す！
